item.title: BlackRock Hires Jefferies’ Chan to Lead Southeast Asia Private Credit
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. has named Yik Ley Chan to lead the firm’s private credit efforts in Southeast Asia, the latest high-level personnel move in the opaque and rapidly growing debt market. Based in Singapore, Chan will be responsible for the origination and execution of private credit inve...

item.title: Accor : BlackRock, agissant pour [...]

item.description: Accor : BlackRock, agissant pour le compte de clients et de fonds dont elle assure la gestion, a franchi en baisse, le seuil de 5% du capital et détient 4,94% du capital et 4,19% des droits de vote (03/06/24)....
